SHOPPING_CART.TITLE: Shopping Cart
SHOPPING_CART.NO_ITEMS: No items in shopping cart yet
SHOPPING_CART.NOT_IN_STOCK: This product is currently not in stock. Therefore shipping is delayed.

FORM.TITLE: Title
FORM.REQUIRED_ZIP: The zip code must be between 1000 and 9999

CONFIRMATION.TITLE: Confirmation
CONFIRMATION.TEXT: Thank you for your order. You should receive an email with the confirmation shortly.

PRODUCT.IN_STOCK: {stock, number} {stock, plural, one {piece} other {pieces}} in stock
PRODUCT.OUT_OF_STOCK: This product is currently out of stock

LOGIN.USER_EXISTS: This email has already been registered
LOGIN.MAIL_SENT: An email has been sent to the address provided. Please follow the instructions to reset your password.
LOGIN.MAIL_NOT_SENT: Unfortunately something went wrong. Please check your data and try again.

EMAIL.ORDER_PREPAYMENT: As soon as we receive the amount due we will ship your order if in stock. Further down in this mail you can find our bank details or attached is an orange payment order.
EMAIL.ORDER_PAYED: The amount due is payed already. Your order will be shipped when in stock.
EMAIL.BANK_DETAILS_HINT: Please supply the order number: {id} as reason for payment.

ERROR.TITLE: Oops! Something went wrong...
ERROR.TEXT: Please try again later or contact us.
ERROR.PROTIP: If you're familiar with it, please file an issue on our Github Repository. Your feedback is important to us!
